biography_text: DOYLE, Michael F., a Representative from Pennsylvania; born in Swissvale, Allegheny County, Pa., August 5, 1953; graduated from Swissvale Area High School, Swissvale, Pa., 1971; B.S., Pennsylvania State University, University Park, Pa., 1975; member of the Swissvale, Pa., borough council, 1977-1981; staff, Pennsylvania state senator Frank Pecora, 1979-1994; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Fourth and to the eleven succeeding Congresses (January 3, 1995-present).

post_secondary_degrees.institution: Pennsylvania State University, University Park, Pa.
